languages.text: {n}С рассеянной улыбкой взглянув на свой оркестр, губернатор как бы между прочим добавляет:{/n} "Музыка!.. — повышает настроение, улучшает аппетит. И между блюдами так приятно взбодрить себя танцем с благопристойным партнером". {n}Он бросает внимательный взгляд на Соломона подле вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор хлопает в ладони, и оркестр сервиторов начинает играть не лишенную мелодичности, но чересчур визгливую мелодию. Хозяин планеты со сладкой улыбкой произносит:{/n} "Музыка улучшает аппетит, а между блюдами приятно взбодрить себя танцем с благопристойным партнером". {n}Он бросает внимательный взгляд на Соломона подле вас.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_FakeGovernor

languages.text: {n}With a distracted smile in the direction of his orchestra, the governor adds as if in passing:{/n} "Music... It lifts the spirit, improves digestion, and allows one to refresh oneself between courses by having a nice dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne standing beside you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С рассеянной улыбкой взглянув на свой оркестр, губернатор как бы между прочим добавляет:{/n} "Музыка!.. — повышает настроение, улучшает аппетит. И между блюдами так приятно взбодрить себя танцем с благопристойным партнером". {n}Он бросает внимательный взгляд на Соломона подле вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With a distracted smile cast towards his orchestra, the governor adds as if in passing:{/n} "Music!… it lifts the spirit, improves digestion, and between courses it is nice to refresh oneself with a dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne beside you.{/n}

{n}With a distracted smile in the direction of his orchestra, the governor adds as if in passing:{/n} "Music... It lifts the spirit, improves digestion, and allows one to refresh oneself between courses by having a nice dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne standing beside you.{/n}

{n}The governor claps his hands, and the orchestra of servitors strikes up a melodious but overly shrill tune. He declares with a saccharine smile,{/n} "Music improves digestion, and between courses it is nice to refresh oneself with a dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne beside you.{/n}

{n}The governor claps his hands, and the orchestra of servitors strikes up a melodious but overly shrill tune. He declares with a saccharine smile,{/n} "Music improves digestion, and between courses it is nice to refresh oneself with a dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne beside you.{/n}

He declares with a saccharine smile,{/n} "Music improves digestion, and between courses it is nice to refresh oneself with a dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne beside you.{/n}

{n}With a distracted smile cast towards his orchestra, the governor adds as if in passing:{/n} "Music!… it lifts the spirit, improves digestion, and between courses it is nice to refresh oneself with a dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne beside you.{/n}

{n}With a distracted smile in the direction of his orchestra, the governor adds as if in passing:{/n} "Music... It lifts the spirit, improves digestion, and allows one to refresh oneself between courses by having a nice dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne standing beside you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit einem verwirrten Lächeln in Richtung seines Orchesters fügt der Gouverneur beiläufig hinzu:{/n} "Musik ... Sie hebt die Laune, belebt die Verdauung und erlaubt uns, uns zwischen den Gängen durch einen Tanz mit einem galanten Partner zu erfrischen." {n}Er wirft dem neben dir stehenden Solomorne einen intensiven Blick zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a distracted smile in the direction of his orchestra, the governor adds as if in passing:{/n} "Music... It lifts the spirit, improves digestion, and allows one to refresh oneself between courses by having a nice dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne standing beside you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem verwirrten Lächeln in Richtung seines Orchesters fügt der Gouverneur beiläufig hinzu:{/n} "Musik ... Sie hebt die Laune, belebt die Verdauung und erlaubt uns, uns zwischen den Gängen durch einen Tanz mit einem galanten Partner zu erfrischen." {n}Er wirft dem neben dir stehenden Solomorne einen intensiven Blick zu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adressant un sourire distrait à l'orchestre, le gouverneur ajoute, presque nonchalamment :{/n} « La musique... elle améliore l'humeur, facilite la digestion, et entre deux plats, il est agréable de se remettre en appétit en dansant avec un galant partenaire. » {n}Il accompagne ces derniers mots d'un regard appuyé en direction de Solomorne, qui se tient à côté de vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a distracted smile in the direction of his orchestra, the governor adds as if in passing:{/n} "Music... It lifts the spirit, improves digestion, and allows one to refresh oneself between courses by having a nice dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne standing beside you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Adressant un sourire distrait à l'orchestre, le gouverneur ajoute, presque nonchalamment :{/n} « La musique... elle améliore l'humeur, facilite la digestion, et entre deux plats, il est agréable de se remettre en appétit en dansant avec un galant partenaire. » {n}Il accompagne ces derniers mots d'un regard appuyé en direction de Solomorne, qui se tient à côté de vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}総督が手を叩くと、サーヴィターたちのオーケストラが旋律的だがやや甲高すぎる調べを奏で始めた。彼は甘ったるい笑みを浮かべて宣言した。{/n}「音楽は消化を助ける。料理の合間には魅力的な相手とのダンスで気分をリフレッシュするのも良いものだ」{n}彼はあなたの隣にいるソロモーンにじっと視線を向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor claps his hands, and the orchestra of servitors strikes up a melodious but overly shrill tune. He declares with a saccharine smile,{/n} "Music improves digestion, and between courses it is nice to refresh oneself with a dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne beside you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総督が手を叩くと、サーヴィターたちのオーケストラが旋律的だがやや甲高すぎる調べを奏で始めた。彼は甘ったるい笑みを浮かべて宣言した。{/n}「音楽は消化を助ける。料理の合間には魅力的な相手とのダンスで気分をリフレッシュするのも良いものだ」{n}彼はあなたの隣にいるソロモーンにじっと視線を向けた。

languages.text: {n}Lanzando una sonrisa distraída hacia su orquesta, el gobernador añade de pasada:{/n} «La música... eleva el espíritu, mejora la digestión y permite que uno descanse entre platos bailando con una pareja galante». {n}Dedica una mirada cargada de intenciones a Solomorne, que espera a tu lado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a distracted smile in the direction of his orchestra, the governor adds as if in passing:{/n} "Music... It lifts the spirit, improves digestion, and allows one to refresh oneself between courses by having a nice dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne standing beside you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lanzando una sonrisa distraída hacia su orquesta, el gobernador añade de pasada:{/n} «La música... eleva el espíritu, mejora la digestión y permite que uno descanse entre platos bailando con una pareja galante». {n}Dedica una mirada cargada de intenciones a Solomorne, que espera a tu lado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}总督带着心不在焉的表情，朝机仆乐团的方向笑了笑，看似漫不经心地补充了几句。{/n}“音乐……可以振奋精神，促进消化。而且，在用餐间隙，还可以与威风凛凛的舞伴一起跳支美妙的舞蹈。”{n}说这些话的时候，他专注地看着你和站在你身边的索罗蒙。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a distracted smile in the direction of his orchestra, the governor adds as if in passing:{/n} "Music... It lifts the spirit, improves digestion, and allows one to refresh oneself between courses by having a nice dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne standing beside you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}总督带着心不在焉的表情，朝机仆乐团的方向笑了笑，看似漫不经心地补充了几句。{/n}“音乐……可以振奋精神，促进消化。而且，在用餐间隙，还可以与威风凛凛的舞伴一起跳支美妙的舞蹈。”{n}说这些话的时候，他专注地看着你和站在你身边的索罗蒙。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Orkestraya dalgınca gülümseyen vali, sanki geçiştirircesine eklemede bulunuyor.{/n} "Müzik... Ruhun gıdasıdır, sindirime iyi gelir ve nazik bir partnerle yapılan danslar da yemek arasında dinlenmeyi sağlar." {n}Yanında duran Solomorne'u baştan aşağı süzüyor.{/n}

It lifts the spirit, improves digestion, and allows one to refresh oneself between courses by having a nice dance with a gallant partner." {n}He casts an intent look at Solomorne standing beside you.{/n}
